definitions: The action of a plan or action having an unintended and unwelcome result.
The action of an internal combustion engine making a loud noise and sending out smoke or flames from the exhaust or inlet.
The action of a firearm discharging prematurely or unexpectedly.
examples: His elaborate scheme was backfiring spectacularly.
The old car kept backfiring on the highway.
The gun was backfiring, making it dangerous to use.
